TextView.android:text: RAM chips are an important part of the computer system. The RAM chips should be 4 GB or more. It helps in running applications in computer without any interruptions.

RAM is an example of primary storage. The RAM chips are installed inside the system unit. The information stored in the RAM is stored temporarily. For example. When the computer suddenly stops working while working on the computer, then the data you typed is not available after you restart the computer. Because that data is stored in RAM. If the computer stops suddenly, then that data is destroyed. Because RAM temporarily stores information. Therefore, while working on your computer, the data should be saved time to time.
